lines.text:
[Draco, Moxie, and Maestro have crash-landed their vehicle in the ocean and are fished out of the water by McGrath and Cuddles on a boat]
So, Draco, ya thought you could cheat McGrath, eh? Well, you, the piano player, and that bungling bear trapper are all goin' on a *little* boat ride. Cuddles here likes shark-fishing, and he ain't got any bait!
